featured.text: When he returned, he felt “pretty good.” 31 When people have sprained a muscle or tendon, they are usually advised not to go right back to exercising until the pain goes away.

definition.zh_def: 扭傷，指關節或肌肉因過度拉伸或撕裂而造成的傷害。
definition.en_def: A sprain is an injury to a ligament caused by overstretching or tearing.
definition.example: She twisted her ankle and ended up with a sprain.
